thread.title: breaks all the fashion rules
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian breaks all the fashion rules | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.com
title: breaks all the fashion rules
text:
This star does not have to be a New York Fashion Week to show off some cutting edge style.
Kim Kardashian stepped out in a look that is sure to be appreciated by the more edgy of the fashion pack and confuse everyone else.
The 36-year-old pushed style boundaries as she headed out in Beverly Hills, California, on Saturday.
Scroll down for video
Breaking the rules: Kim Kardashian pushed style boundaries as she stepped out in Beverly Hills, california, on Saturday
The star - whose husband Kanye West once rapped 'What's Gucci?' - took a stroll in a sweater from the fashion house.
With vintage Gucci sweatshirts becoming a streatwear style staple - so much so that Gucci recently re-released some vintage looks - Kim made sure to incorporate the trend into her look.
The reality star wore the on-trend sweater with a pair of bike shorts which highlighted her now very lean legs.
Taking the look from wearable to you have to a be a celebrity to replicate it, Kim wore it with a full length black fur coat.
Ready to ride: The 36-year-old wore an on-trend Gucci sweatshirt with black bike shorts
Show your brand allegiance in a logo sweatshirt like Kim's £961.08 Gucci cotton sweatshirt with Gucci print
Get the hoodie version!
Buy now
Kim Kardashian was spotted out and about in LA this week sporting an eclectic ensemble featuring a pair of black cycling shorts teamed with a Gucci sweatshirt an oversized fur coat and lace up beige ankle boots.
Whilst we won't be recreating this look anytime soon, we can definitely get on board with this sweatshirt!
Logo tees and sweats are set to be a big trend and Gucci is the top of every fashionista's list, so if you want to join the style set copy Kim and get your hands on one now!
You can buy the hoodie version of Kim's jumper directly from the Gucci website (click right), or for more choice check out our edit of alternatives below.

She's fur-real: Taking the look from wearable to you have to a be a celebrity to replicate it, Kim wore it with a full length black fur coat
In a rare move for a member of the Kardashian family, the coat appeared to be faux fur.
Kim finished off the look with a pair of her favorite Celine sunglasses and boots from her husband's Yeezy Season 4 collection.
Kanye is in New York to unveil his latest collection during fashion week.
The rapper stepped out on Saturday with peroxided blonde locks and wearing a pair of Gosha Rubchinskiy sweatpants, a vintage T-shirt with a navy bomber and a pair of his own boots.
Having more fun? Kanye West is in New York ahead of his fashion presentation and debuted peroxided blonde locks
